text: Divorce is the price people play for playing with matches.
author: Evan Esar

text: A vacation is like love: anticipated with pleasure, experienced with discomfort, and remembered with nostalgia.
author: Evan Esar

text: Consistency is a jewel, but too much jewelry is vulgar.
author: Evan Esar

text: The only time a lazy man ever succeeds is when he tries to do nothing.
author: Evan Esar

text: The only way to cure an egotist from bragging is by surgery--amputation at the neck.
author: Evan Esar

text: With a braggart, it's no sooner done than said.
author: Evan Esar

text: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
author: Evan Esar

text: Many a man who goes to Las Vegas to get away from it all soon finds that Las Vegas gets it all away from him.
author: Evan Esar

text: Age brings wisdom to some men, and to others chess.
author: Evan Esar

text: A laugh a day keeps the psychiatrist away.
author: Evan Esar

text: We do not stop laughing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop laughing.
author: Evan Esar

text: The man who doctors himself with the aid of medical books, runs the risk of dying of a typographical error.
author: Evan Esar

text: You can't judge the ability of a doctor by the amount of praise the undertakers give him.
author: Evan Esar

text: The quizzical expression of the monkey at the zoo comes from his wondering whether he is his brother's keeper, or his keeper's brother.
author: Evan Esar

text: The best time to give advice to your children is while they're still young enough to believe you know what you're talking about.
author: Evan Esar

text: The trouble with the world is that laziness is seldom curable and never fatal.
author: Evan Esar

text: Zoo: An excellent lace to study the habits of human beings.
author: Evan Esar

text: An obsession is an idea which you must get out of your mind if you are not to go out of your mind.
author: Evan Esar

text: Computers can figure out all kinds of problems, except the things in this world that just don't add up.
author: Evan Esar

text: The honeymoon is the only period when a woman isn't trying to reform her husband.
author: Evan Esar

text: Communism is a form of government under which every citizen at election time enjoys the privilege of voting yes.
author: Evan Esar

text: Communism is a form of society where the less people have to eat, the more they have to swallow.
author: Evan Esar

text: Housework is what a woman does that nobody notices unless she hasn't done it.
author: Evan Esar

text: Definition of Statistics: The science of producing unreliable facts from reliable figures.
author: Evan Esar

text: Charm is to a woman what perfume is to a flower.
author: Evan Esar

text: Success comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration, and inspiration!
author: Evan Esar

text: The diamond is the hardest stone -- to get.
author: Evan Esar

text: In elections, the undecided vote is usually the deciding factor.
author: Evan Esar

text: If you can't win, make the fellow ahead of you break the record.
author: Evan Esar

text: The only place where you can find equality is in the cemetery.
author: Evan Esar

text: Public speaking is the art of diluting a two-minute idea with a two-hour vocabulary.
author: Evan Esar

text: A cynic sees little to admire in the world, while the world sees even less to admire in him.
author: Evan Esar

text: A special skill, like speaking several languages, or keeping your mouth shut in one.
author: Evan Esar

text: A bureaucrat is an official who is clothed with power and whom it doesn't fit.
author: Evan Esar

text: The man who avoids debt doesn't have to worry about avoiding his creditors.
author: Evan Esar

text: When a schoolboy has original ideas, they are usually confined to spelling.
author: Evan Esar

text: Walking isn't a lost art â€” one must, by some means, get to the garage.
author: Evan Esar

text: This may be the age of automation, but love is still being made by hand.
author: Evan Esar

text: The most popular form of altruism is giving to others the advice you cannot use yourself.
author: Evan Esar

text: There would be no population explosion if people who are trying to keep the wolf from the door wouldn't let the stork fly in through the window.
author: Evan Esar

text: A gentleman farmer never dirties himself with the soil or soils himself with the dirt.
author: Evan Esar

text: The tongue is the only muscle in the human body that never gets tired.
author: Evan Esar

text: Next time a man tells you talk is cheap, ask him if he knows how much a session of Congress costs.
author: Evan Esar

text: A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
author: Evan Esar

text: Tact is the ability to shut your mouth before someone else does it for you.
author: Evan Esar

text: Tact is giving a person a pat on the back when you feel like giving him a kick in the pants.
author: Evan Esar

text: Adam and Eve were the first of all unions to defy management.
author: Evan Esar

text: The mint makes it first, it is up to you to make it last.
author: Evan Esar

text: You can't name anything that's more expensive than being good natured.
author: Evan Esar

text: The best things in life are free, but the trouble is that the next best are so expensive.
author: Evan Esar

text: An expensive wife often makes a pensive husband.
author: Evan Esar

text: A lot of people get credit for being well-behaved simply because they haven't the money to be otherwise.
author: Evan Esar

text: Family: a social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with the closet space.
author: Evan Esar

text: The little boy who goes to the store and forgets what his mother sent him for, will probably grow up to be a congressman.
author: Evan Esar

text: A clever girl always seem to know less than the man she happens to be talking to.
author: Evan Esar

text: When a wife laughs at her husband's jokes, it's not because they are clever, but because she is.
author: Evan Esar

text: Some women are so clever that you can't talk with them for ten minutes without beginning to realize how brilliant you are.
author: Evan Esar

text: Many woman is so clever that she manages to let no one suspect her of being half as foolish as she really is.
author: Evan Esar

text: It takes a clever girl to keep a man at arm's length without losing her grip on him.
author: Evan Esar

text: By the time the person is old enough to know better, he thinks he's clever enough to get away with it.
author: Evan Esar

text: Sometimes nothing is the cleverest thing you can say when you want to say something clever.
author: Evan Esar

text: Of all the clever wives, the cleverest is the one who never lets her husband suspect how clever she is.
author: Evan Esar

text: A clever girl flatters a man by asking the kind of questions he is able to answer.
author: Evan Esar

text: Every executive wishes he were as clever as he thinks his secretary thinks he is.
author: Evan Esar

text: There's a substitute for everything, but no one yet figured out a substitute for hard work.
author: Evan Esar

text: The longer a wedding ring is worn, the harder it is to remove.
author: Evan Esar

text: When a young man gives his girl a ring, he gives it with all his heart and most of his savings.
author: Evan Esar

text: Opportunity knocks for every man, but a woman gets a ring.
author: Evan Esar

text: During courtship a girl is unpredictable until she gets an engagement ring - then she shows her hand.
author: Evan Esar

text: The bright sparkle of a diamond ring often renders a woman stone-blind to the defects of the man who gives it.
author: Evan Esar

text: A wedding ring may not be as tight as a tourniquet, but it stops the wearer's circulation.
author: Evan Esar

text: Some girls get rings with large diamonds, others get rings that look as if they were all paid for.
author: Evan Esar

text: A ring on the finger is worth two on the phone.
author: Evan Esar

text: An engagement ring is a piece of jewelry that usually turns a right-handed girl into a left handed one.
author: Evan Esar

text: To the bachelor, a wedding ring symbolizes a vicious cycle.
author: Evan Esar

text: A girl uses soft soap to get a ring off her finger - and also to get one on.
author: Evan Esar

text: Most of us are either too thin to enjoy eating. or too fat to enjoy walking.
author: Evan Esar

text: If you want to get fat, don't eat fast; if you want to get thin. don't eat fast.
author: Evan Esar

text: No wonder a father has mixed feelings when his son goes off to college; while he loses a son, he gains a car.
author: Evan Esar

text: A wedding is a ceremony at which a woman acquires another mind of her own.
author: Evan Esar

text: A wedding takes only a few hours, but the arguments go on forever.
author: Evan Esar

text: The only wedding that is sure to go off without a hitch is where the groom doesn't show up.
author: Evan Esar

text: A shotgun wedding is one in which the bride's father says, 'He does'.
author: Evan Esar

text: Before the wedding, you expect too much of marriage; after the wedding, you get too much of it.
author: Evan Esar

text: Love should be behind every wedding, but not too far behind.
author: Evan Esar

text: After paying for the wedding, about the only thing a father has left to give away is the bride.
author: Evan Esar

text: At a wedding the bride is usually well groomed and the groom well bridled.
author: Evan Esar

text: At a wedding, a father gives his daughter up with the reluctance, and a mother gives her up with relief.
author: Evan Esar

text: A wedding is the formality a man has to go through before going to work for a new boss.
author: Evan Esar

text: The happiest days in a movie star's life are her wedding days.
author: Evan Esar

text: There's one good thing about tight shoes: they make you forget your other troubles.
author: Evan Esar

text: If the high cost of living goes any higher, we'll be buying our shoes one at a time instead of a pair.
author: Evan Esar

text: There's nothing smaller than some women's feet, except the shoes they're in.
author: Evan Esar

text: The first thing a woman would do if she were in a man's shoes is kicking them off.
author: Evan Esar

text: What this country needs is a pair of shoes that will increase in size along with the growth of children's feet.
author: Evan Esar

text: A women's little feet usually run up a big shoe bill.
author: Evan Esar

text: Another way to find out where the shoe pinches is to foot your wife's shoe bills.
author: Evan Esar

text: A man buys shoes to fit his feet; a woman, to fit the occasion.
author: Evan Esar

text: A woman is likely to keep trying on shoes till the salesman has a fit.
author: Evan Esar

text: The woman who is shopping for shoes has no sense for the fitness of things.
author: Evan Esar

text: A woman has passed the dangerous age as soon as she starts trying on a pair of shoes for comfort.
author: Evan Esar

text: No man has ever been able to explain why a woman feels more comfortable in uncomfortable shoes than she does in comfortable ones.
author: Evan Esar

text: Liquor works two ways; it will either put you on top of the world, or under the table.
author: Evan Esar

text: A liquor store is where they collect taxes for the government and also sell liquor
author: Evan Esar

text: Liquor should not be given to the man who is given to liquor.
author: Evan Esar

text: Liquor doesn't deteriorate with age, but the man who drinks too much of it does.
author: Evan Esar

text: Get the best of liquor, but don't let liquor get the best of you.
author: Evan Esar

text: Liquor is an insiduos habit; you start out by drinking now and then, and very soon you are drinking more now than you did then.
author: Evan Esar

text: A little liquor makes you lose your inhibitions, a lot makes you give inhibitions.
author: Evan Esar

text: A check for liquor is not a check for liquor.
author: Evan Esar

text: During courtship a girl is unpredictable until she gets an engagement ring then she shows her hand.
author: Evan Esar

text: The best way for a woman to preserve her wedding ring is to dip it in dishwater three times a day
author: Evan Esar

text: The man who invented the alarm clock believed people slept too long or worked too little.
author: Evan Esar

text: The only thing worse than hearing the alarm clock is not hearing it.
author: Evan Esar

text: Some men have alarm clocks; others have their wives elbows.
author: Evan Esar

text: Of all daylight-saving plans, the best by far is an alarm clock.
author: Evan Esar

text: When an alarm clock wakes a man up, it makes him feel not like the early bird, but like the worm.
author: Evan Esar

text: An alarm clock is a device that wakes you up just in time to go back to sleep.
author: Evan Esar

text: What this country needs is an alarm clock that can be set on Saturday night to ring Monday morning.
author: Evan Esar

text: The man who invented the alarm clock probably did more than anyone else to arouse the working classes.
author: Evan Esar

text: An alarm clock is built with a mechanism to scare the daylights into you.
author: Evan Esar

text: Take a lesson from the clock; it passes the time by keeping its hands busy.
author: Evan Esar

text: An office clock is rarely stolen, probably because everyone watches it.
author: Evan Esar

text: No matter how fast a clock may run, it always winds up at the same place.
author: Evan Esar

text: In some homes the clock, like father, is always wrong.
author: Evan Esar

text: A clock is a modest piece of furniture that covers its face with its hands, and runs down its own works.
author: Evan Esar

text: If a fee were charged to see the sun rise, almost everybody would be up to watch it.
author: Evan Esar

text: One man's sunset is another man's sunrise
author: Evan Esar

text: Calling anything foolproof seems to take a lot for granted.
author: Evan Esar

text: The honeymoon is over when the bride who took her husband for better or for worse, starts taking him for granted.
author: Evan Esar

text: In all affairs it's a healthy thing not and then to hang a question mark on the things you have long taken for granted.
author: Evan Esar

text: Argumentative people have one thing in common: they are always ready to dispute an indisputable fact.
author: Evan Esar

text: The most common argument against marriage is the one between husband wife.
author: Evan Esar

text: When you win an argument with your wife, the argument is not over.
author: Evan Esar

text: The less sound a man's argument, the louder he talks.
author: Evan Esar

text: Only one man has the right to boast, and that's the man who never does.
author: Evan Esar

text: If you don't get the better of yourself, someone else will.
author: Evan Esar

text: Easter is the only time when it's perfectly safe to put all your eggs in one basket.
author: Evan Esar

text: Too many women think Easter Sunday is Decoration Day.
author: Evan Esar

text: There are always some churchgoers whom the preacher doesn't remember from one Easter to the next.
author: Evan Esar

text: Children prefer snow, but adults prefer rain because it is self shoveling.
author: Evan Esar

text: The surest way to bring spring showers is to hose the lawn and sprinkle the flowers.
author: Evan Esar

text: Rainy days come to those who save up for them.
author: Evan Esar

text: The rains that nourish the optimist's flowers make the pessimist's weeds grow.
author: Evan Esar

text: The rainy days for which a man saves usually arrive during his vacation.
author: Evan Esar

text: To some men the only symbol of hospitality is a corkscrew.
author: Evan Esar

text: The man who takes to drink when his wife leaves him should be careful not to overdo the celebration.
author: Evan Esar

text: Sometimes when a man takes a day off to celebrate, he needs another day off to get over it.
author: Evan Esar

text: Some people's idea of a celebration is to enjoy a Christmas they'll never forget and a New Year's they can't remember.
author: Evan Esar

text: When an alcoholic wants to celebrate an occasion, does he go out and get sober.
author: Evan Esar

text: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
author: Evan Esar

text: The most positive way to progress to the top is to start at the bottom and never stop.
author: Evan Esar

text: The best way of getting ahead of most people is by getting along with some and getting around others.
author: Evan Esar

text: More and more married women are working nowadays, some of them even at home.
author: Evan Esar

text: Liar is the one who pretends to be very good or the one who pretends to be very bad.
author: Evan Esar

text: A pathological liar can always be expected to tell you where the truth lies.
author: Evan Esar

text: All men are liars, but some are not found out until after they are married.
author: Evan Esar

text: A liar's worst misfortune is not that no one believes him, but that he can't believe anyone else.
author: Evan Esar

text: If there were no listeners, there would be no liars.
author: Evan Esar

text: There's only one person who can lie more brazenly than a pathological liar, and that's another pathological liar.
author: Evan Esar
